content:
Jurkiewicz family

1 Abraham JURKIEWICZ                 c1765 - 1835 #196
 + Bayla                             - 1847 #290 (Abraham+Faigel)
  2x Isaak JURKIEWICZ                1795-96 - Dec 13, 1872 #506
    + Dobrysz HERSZLOWICZ            1799-1800 - Sep 9, 1873 #806 (Jonas+Corka Lipman)
          married May 13, 1819 #19
     3x Elkan JURKIEWICZ             1820 #61 - Jul 17, 1883 #244
       + Hinda LIPSCHYTZ             1819-20 - after 1890
             married May 9, 1838 #26

                   married 1894 #1
